name: Ascension (Max Anderson's Mind)
description:
You are a part of a cult that is less than a week away from Ascending to the New World! You must protect your leader and fellow members by any means necessary from Unchosen people who want to destroy your cult.

Controls:

Move player and bus - WASD
Shoot - right click press / right click hold
Jump fence - Space
Open doors - E
Cure self (restore player health) - C
Treat friend (revive friendly NPC) - T
Repair bus (when repair tool is equipped) - Hold R at front bumper of bus
Skip wave break - Hold Ctrl

You can find the Devlogs for Ascension on my YouTube Channel:

https://www.youtube.com/c/MaxAndersonFilms
